All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionType  
    App
    Generates the JavaFX UI
    AppController
    Acts as a single point of control for loading scenes or exiting the application.
    Appointment
    The type Appointment.
    AppointmentsDAO
    The type Appointments dao.
    Contact
    The type Contact.
    ContactsDAO
    The type Contacts dao.
    CountriesDAO
    The type Countries dao.
    Country
    The type Country.
    Customer
    The type Customer.
    CustomersDAO
    The type Customers dao.
    DataAccessObject<T extends DataTransferObject>
    Generic abstract class for DAO entity classes used in application
    DataCache
    Acts as a single update point and cache for all DAO operations Reduces data retrieval time by storing a local copy of data
    DataTransferObject
    Interface to ensure compatibility of all entity objects that DAOs will be created for Implements a getID() function to allow the DAO to retrieve ID from entity.
    DBConnection
    Acts as a single point of update for all logic relating to database connections
    Division
    The type Division.
    DivisionsDAO
    The type Divisions dao.
    Format
    Abstract class with static variables to organize all format objects used in app.
    InputValidators
    Abstract class with static methods to organize input validation functions
    ItemType  
    LoginPageController
    The FXML Controller for the login page.
    Main
    The entrypoint for the application.
    MainMenuController
    The FXML Controller for the main menu page.
    ManageAppointmentsController
    The FXML Controller for the manage appointments page.
    ManageCustomersController
    The FXML Controller for the manage customer page.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    The FXML Controller for the modify appointment page.
    ModifyCustomerController
    The FXML Controller for the modify customer page.
    Prompts
    Abstract class with static methods to organize all prompt messages used in app.
    ReportsController
    The FXML Controller for the report page.
    SessionInformation
    The type Session information.
    TextFieldLength
    Class to return a TextFormatter object to restrict the max character length of a text field
    TimeSpinnerValueFactory
    SpinnerValueFactory object used to format a LocalDateTime object in a Spinner object.
    TimeTableCellFactory
    TableCellFactory object used to format a LocalDateTime object in an Appointment cell.
    UpcomingAppointmentCellFactory
    CellFactory object used to format an Appointment object in a list cell Displays appointments title and formatted time
    User
    The type User.
    UsersDAO
    The type Users dao.
